de.mrapp.android.sidebar - package de.mrapp.android.sidebar
 
de.mrapp.android.sidebar.animation - package de.mrapp.android.sidebar.animation
 
de.mrapp.android.sidebar.inflater - package de.mrapp.android.sidebar.inflater
 
de.mrapp.android.sidebar.savedstate - package de.mrapp.android.sidebar.savedstate
 
de.mrapp.android.sidebar.util - package de.mrapp.android.sidebar.util
 
de.mrapp.android.sidebar.view - package de.mrapp.android.sidebar.view
 
DEBUG - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.BuildConfig
 
DEFAULT_ANIMATION_SPEED - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.Sidebar
The default speed of the animation, which is used to show or hide the sidebar, in dp per millisecond.
DEFAULT_CONTENT_MODE - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.Sidebar
The default content mode, which specifies how the content view is handled when the sidebar becomes shown or hidden.
DEFAULT_CONTENT_OVERLAY_COLOR - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.Sidebar
The default color of the overlay, which is shown in front of the main content, when the sidebar is shown.
DEFAULT_CONTENT_OVERLAY_TRANSPARENCY - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.Sidebar
The default transparency of the overlay, which is shown in front of the main content, when the sidebar is shown.
DEFAULT_DRAG_MODE_WHEN_HIDDEN - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.Sidebar
The default drag mode, which specifies the region, where drag gestures are recognized, when the sidebar is currently hidden.
DEFAULT_DRAG_MODE_WHEN_SHOWN - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.Sidebar
The default drag mode, which specifies the region, where drag gestures are recognized, when the sidebar is currently shown.
DEFAULT_DRAG_SENSITIVITY - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.Sidebar
The default sensitivity, which specifies the distance after which dragging has an effect on the sidebar, in relation to an internal value range.
DEFAULT_DRAG_THRESHOLD - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.Sidebar
The default distance, the sidebar has to be dragged until its state changes, in relation to the whole distance.
DEFAULT_HIDE_ON_BACK_BUTTON - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.Sidebar
Specifies, whether by default the sidebar should be hidden, when the device's back button is clicked, or not.
DEFAULT_HIDE_ON_CONTENT_CLICK - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.Sidebar
Specifies, whether by default the sidebar should be hidden, when the main content is clicked by the user, or not.
DEFAULT_LOCATION - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.Sidebar
The default location of the sidebar.
DEFAULT_MAX_SIDEBAR_OFFSET - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.Sidebar
The default maximum offset of the sidebar in dp or -1, if the sidebar's offset should not be restricted.
DEFAULT_MAX_SIDEBAR_WIDTH - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.Sidebar
The default maximum width of the sidebar in dp or -1, if the sidebar's width should not be restricted.
DEFAULT_SCROLL_RATIO - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.Sidebar
The default ratio between the distance, the sidebar is moved by, when it becomes shown or hidden, in relation to the distance, the content is moved by.
DEFAULT_SHADOW_COLOR - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.Sidebar
The default color of the sidebar's shadow.
DEFAULT_SHADOW_WIDTH - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.Sidebar
The default width of the sidebar's shadow in dp.
DEFAULT_SHOW_ON_SIDEBAR_CLICK - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.Sidebar
Specifies, whether by default the sidebar should be shown, when it is clicked by the user, or not.
DEFAULT_SIDEBAR_OFFSET - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.Sidebar
The default amount of space in relation to the width of the parent view, the sidebar is visible, even if it is currently hidden.
DEFAULT_SIDEBAR_WIDTH - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.Sidebar
The default width of the sidebar in relation to the width of its parent view.
disabled - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.R.id
 
dispatchTouchEvent(MotionEvent) - Method in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.Sidebar
 
DragHelper - Class in de.mrapp.android.sidebar.util
A helper class, which may be used to recognize drag gestures.
DragHelper(int) - Constructor for class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.util.DragHelper
Creates a new helper class, which may be used to recognize drag gestures, which uses a specific threshold.
DragMode - Enum in de.mrapp.android.sidebar
Contains all possible drag modes, which can be applied on a sidebar to specify, on which regions dragging should be recognized.
dragModeWhenHidden - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.R.attr
Must be one of the following constant values.
dragModeWhenShown - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.R.attr
Must be one of the following constant values.
dragSensitivity - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.R.attr
Must be a fractional value, which is a floating point number appended with either % or %p, such as "14.5%".
dragThreshold - Static variable in class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.R.attr
Must be a fractional value, which is a floating point number appended with either % or %p, such as "14.5%".
drawable() - Constructor for class de.mrapp.android.sidebar.R.drawable
